title: Cant login, get stuck on authenticating
body:
I cant log into game from client. I am from EUW. What is the problem?

Thank you

replies.body: A lot of players have been reporting some authentication troubles and this weird patcher loop issue this morning, but I've gotten word that those *should* be smoothed out at this point! Let me know if you're still getting stuck on authenticating and I can help troubleshoot with you though!
